title: Nordstrom’s Sale Section Never Misses—Shop Our 20 Favorite Latest Finds
description: Gucci sunglasses, Reformation dresses, and more must-haves await.
excerpt: Nordstrom's sale section is packed with deals on fashion and beauty. Shop our edit, including Gucci sunglasses, Reformation dresses, and the Shark FlexStyle.
text: Gucci 55mm Oval SunglassesWe’d be fools to pass up the chance to save hundreds on a sleek pair of Gucci sunglasses, especially since the oval shape is destined to flatter any face. AG Hattie Barrel Leg JeansEvery denim lover needs at least one pair of barrel jeans. Not only are they universally flattering, but this pair will work nicely with any shoe in your closet, from trusty sneakers to sleek flats. This woven option can fit a laptop and is roomy enough to double as a beach bag. Shark Beauty FlexStyleEyeing the Shark FlexStyle? Now is the time to add to cart. Not only does this system work with any hair type, but the brand claims that it will deliver minimal heat damage due to its temperature-regulating technology.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRails Rylee Fringe Hem Sweater DressFor those who have already begun planning your summer vacation wardrobe (and to those who haven’t, start now!), add this bold green number to your cart. The fringed hem will turn heads everywhere you go. Jenny Bird Nouveaux Puff EarringsCelebrities and ELLE editors alike can’t get enough of Jenny Bird’s trendy-yet-timeless styles. Right now, you can save 40 percent on these versatile puff earrings, which offer a change of pace from your everyday hoops. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowVeronica Beard Grommet SatchelThis bag proves that you don’t need to go full-on grunge to incorporate studded styles into your rotation. On sale in both brown and black leather, this satchel is the ideal size for exploring new cities this summer.rag & bone Martha Stripe Button-Up ShirtBreezy button-ups are some of the most versatile pieces in our transitional fashion playbooks. Whether you style this staple with crisp denim or a flouncy white skirt, it’ll evoke coastal cool. Mansur Gavriel Dream Ballerina FlatBoth ballet flats and metallic styles are core parts of our spring shoe rotation, so it only makes sense to snag this gold pair that offers the best of both worlds.Citizens of Humanity Brynn Wide Leg Trouser JeansAlthough we’d like to live in sweatpants, sometimes the dress code calls for something more refined. Luckily, these drawstring jeans lend themselves to all-day comfort—and add a unique spin to any look. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe GREAT. It’s packed with hyaluronic acid that is meant to target fine lines, puffiness, and dark circles.Vince Satin A-Line Midi SkirtWhile this A-line skirt will satisfy the strictest dress codes, dressing for even the most buttoned-up offices doesn’t have to feel drab.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowReformation Serafina Denim Midi Dress Nordstrom’s sale section is an excellent place to find versatile pieces that can be worn season after season. This Reformation dress can be paired with sandals and a raffia bag during spring and summer, then styled with a turtleneck and boots once the weather turns. En Saison Roan Pleated Waist ShirtdressThe timeless shirtdress silhouette gets a trendy upgrade with this cinched waist design. It’s sure to become a one-and-done option you’ll reach for on days when you feel like you have absolutely nothing to wear. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowNike Cortez SneakerYou’ll be hard-pressed to find a better deal on this classic sneaker silhouette. The bold blue accent will lend your white T-shirt and denim shorts outfit formula a hint of old-school cool.Favorite Daughter The Jennifer Super High Waist Straight Leg JeansCrisp denim transcends seasons. We’re eyeing this pair, complete with a versatile wash, ultra-high rise, and straight-leg design that works nicely with your favorite heels.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGanni Stripe Tie Front TopCan’t resist cottagecore-inspired pieces? This demure tie-front top with stripes, slightly flared sleeves, and a ruffled collar is begging to be yours. You can also save 40 percent on the matching pants, still available in a handful of sizes.Mango Serpi Snakeskin Print Long Sleeve ShirtdressChances are, your wardrobe is already stocked with neutral dresses, but we’re loving this bold statement snake print for a change. Pair it with chic flip-flops for a carefree weekend ensemble look.
html:
Gucci 55mm Oval Sunglasses

We’d be fools to pass up the chance to save hundreds on a sleek pair of Gucci sunglasses, especially since the oval shape is destined to flatter any face.

AG Hattie Barrel Leg Jeans

Every denim lover needs at least one pair of barrel jeans. Not only are they universally flattering, but this pair will work nicely with any shoe in your closet, from trusty sneakers to sleek flats.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Naghedi Havana Stripe Woven Tote

If you’re planning to refresh your office wardrobe for warmer days ahead, upgrade your work tote while you’re at it. This woven option can fit a laptop and is roomy enough to double as a beach bag.

Shark Beauty FlexStyle

Eyeing the Shark FlexStyle? Now is the time to add to cart. Not only does this system work with any hair type, but the brand claims that it will deliver minimal heat damage due to its temperature-regulating technology.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rails Rylee Fringe Hem Sweater Dress

For those who have already begun planning your summer vacation wardrobe (and to those who haven’t, start now!), add this bold green number to your cart. The fringed hem will turn heads everywhere you go.

Jenny Bird Nouveaux Puff Earrings

Celebrities and ELLE editors alike can’t get enough of Jenny Bird’s trendy-yet-timeless styles. Right now, you can save 40 percent on these versatile puff earrings, which offer a change of pace from your everyday hoops.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Veronica Beard Grommet Satchel

This bag proves that you don’t need to go full-on grunge to incorporate studded styles into your rotation. On sale in both brown and black leather, this satchel is the ideal size for exploring new cities this summer.

rag & bone Martha Stripe Button-Up Shirt

Breezy button-ups are some of the most versatile pieces in our transitional fashion playbooks. Whether you style this staple with crisp denim or a flouncy white skirt, it’ll evoke coastal cool.

Mansur Gavriel Dream Ballerina Flat

Both ballet flats and metallic styles are core parts of our spring shoe rotation, so it only makes sense to snag this gold pair that offers the best of both worlds.

Citizens of Humanity Brynn Wide Leg Trouser Jeans

Although we’d like to live in sweatpants, sometimes the dress code calls for something more refined. Luckily, these drawstring jeans lend themselves to all-day comfort—and add a unique spin to any look.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The GREAT. Varsity Stripe Cardigan

The bold stripes and cheery color palette on this super-soft cardigan make it a great candidate for when the A/C starts cranking in the office come summer.

FARM Rio Flower Leopards Dress

Although FARM Rio might be best-known for colorful vacation-ready prints, we can’t resist the moody vibes of this black-and-white mini.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Perricone MD Cold Plasma+ Eye Cream

Nordstrom’s sale section also includes an impressive array of skincare deals, like a 40 percent price cut on this Perricone MD eye cream. It’s packed with hyaluronic acid that is meant to target fine lines, puffiness, and dark circles.

Vince Satin A-Line Midi Skirt

While this A-line skirt will satisfy the strictest dress codes, dressing for even the most buttoned-up offices doesn’t have to feel drab.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Reformation Serafina Denim Midi Dress

Nordstrom’s sale section is an excellent place to find versatile pieces that can be worn season after season. This Reformation dress can be paired with sandals and a raffia bag during spring and summer, then styled with a turtleneck and boots once the weather turns.

En Saison Roan Pleated Waist Shirtdress

The timeless shirtdress silhouette gets a trendy upgrade with this cinched waist design. It’s sure to become a one-and-done option you’ll reach for on days when you feel like you have absolutely nothing to wear.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Nike Cortez Sneaker

You’ll be hard-pressed to find a better deal on this classic sneaker silhouette. The bold blue accent will lend your white T-shirt and denim shorts outfit formula a hint of old-school cool.

Favorite Daughter The Jennifer Super High Waist Straight Leg Jeans

Crisp denim transcends seasons. We’re eyeing this pair, complete with a versatile wash, ultra-high rise, and straight-leg design that works nicely with your favorite heels.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Ganni Stripe Tie Front Top

Can’t resist cottagecore-inspired pieces? This demure tie-front top with stripes, slightly flared sleeves, and a ruffled collar is begging to be yours. You can also save 40 percent on the matching pants, still available in a handful of sizes.

Mango Serpi Snakeskin Print Long Sleeve Shirtdress

Chances are, your wardrobe is already stocked with neutral dresses, but we’re loving this bold statement snake print for a change. Pair it with chic flip-flops for a carefree weekend ensemble look.
